quote_last: , Werner knows, the Frenchman will broadcast again, and Werner will have to switch off the transceiver or else pretend that he hears only static.
title: All The Light We Cannot See
author: Anthony Doerr

quote_first: Then the lights went out all over the city. It happened at
quote_last: according to power-house records, but Blake’s diary gives no indication of the time. The entry is merely, ‘Lights out - God help me.’
title: The Haunter of the Dark
author: HP Lovecraft
